thread.title: Video: Star Wars – The Force Awakens trailer released
thread.title_full: Video: Star Wars – The Force Awakens trailer released

title: Video: Star Wars – The Force Awakens trailer released
text:
Entertainment Editor 
Tuesday 20 Oct 2015 4:24 p.m. 
The latest and final trailer for Star Wars: The Force Awakens has just been unleashed online and is currently melting down the internet. 
Fan anticipation has moved into hyper-drive ahead of the December 17 release of the film. 
The new Star Wars is of course courtesy of Star Trek director J.J. Abrams, and reunites the stars of the original beloved trilogy, as well as introducing a whole galaxy of new ones. 
This final trailer manages to tease a good many of them, while giving away very little. 
Watch the final trailer for Star Wars: The Force Awakens.
